text: Motion

Right, Mikoto,
about the dry air in your room...

Ah... Yeah,
it seems like the air conditioning was acting up a bit.

But the staff members
quickly addressed it for me.
I see, that's good then.
Is there anything else bothering you?

...Right now, I don't think so,
why do you ask?
Oh, if there isn't, then it's fine.

I see...
But...
Yes?
Oh, no, it's not like I'm struggling or anything,

I just thought since we're here for the training camp,
we could allocate more time for practice...
At least, that's what i thought.

Huh...?
More than we're already doing?

I believe you're already
putting in your maximum effort, Mikoto...
Is that so?

I've been given the opportunity to stay here
overnight and live a comfortable life.

I thought
that would give me more time to practice...
But things aren't much different from usual.

...We'll make sure you get proper rest,
at least for the duration of this training camp!
